author: Xbox
description:
Agent, we have a new target for you.
Mads Mikkelsen returns as Le Chiffre from the 2006 film “Casino Royale”, the iconic private banker to the criminal underworld, known for his mastery of games of chance and probability. A recent failed venture left him in dire straits, losing vast sums of both legitimate and illicit capital, and in a desperate bid to recover, he has arranged a high-stakes poker game at the Casino Monarchique in Paris. Agent 47 has been tasked with infiltrating the perilous event and will have to find his way to his target to prevent havoc being wreaked across the world. 

The Banker Elusive Target will be available until July 6. Play the mission for free on Xbox

#HITMAN #Agent47

author: Xbox
description:
Build A Rocket Boy and IO Interactive Unveil Explosive MindsEye Trailer at Summer Game Fest, Teasing Agent 47’s Arrival in Post-Launch Hitman Collaboration.

At Summer Game Fest, Build A Rocket Boy and IO Interactive dropped a thrilling new trailer for MindsEye, showcasing heart-pounding combat, a gripping near-future world, and the emotional journey of protagonist Jacob Diaz. The trailer culminated in a jaw-dropping reveal: the legendary Agent 47 from IO Interactive’s Hitman franchise will join MindsEye as a playable character in a post-launch MindsEye x Hitman collaboration mission, set to launch in July 2025.

This highly anticipated MindsEye x Hitman mission will be crafted using Build A Rocket Boy’s revolutionary Game Creation System, a powerful and intuitive system empowering players and crafters alike to design custom games, weave new narratives, and create entirely original experiences. This collaboration promises to blend MindsEye’s immersive storytelling with Agent 47’s sign
title: MindsEye - Official Launch Trailer

author: Xbox
description:
hit rewind ⏪ press play ▶ 

Mixtape is coming soon on Xbox Series X|S and available with Game Pass.

On their last night together, three friends embark on one final adventure. Play through a mixtape of memories, set to the soundtrack of a generation.

En route to their final party together, a perfectly curated playlist draws three friends into dreamlike reenactments of their formative memories. Experience a variety of narrative vignettes exploring the pivotal moments that shaped them. Players will immerse themselves in the teenage wasteland by playing through a mixtape of joyful gameplay, from skateboarding and flying to taking photos after hours at an abandoned theme park, hitting baseballs, and putting on a fireworks show from the backseat of a car. It's the greatest hits of the teenage experience, from the first kiss to the last dance.

Featuring music from DEVO, Roxy Music, Lush, The Smashing Pumpkins, Iggy Pop, Siouxsie and the Banshees, Joy Division, the Cure and many more.

Dev
title: Mixtape Summer Game Fest 2025 Trailer

description:
https://www.xbox.com/games/store/mortal-kombat-legacy-kollection/9PKVPJ0NHCTS

Step into the arena and choose your fighter! Mortal Kombat: Legacy Kollection includes all the essential games from Mortal Kombat's early years. Experience the legendary origins of the franchise with the iconic arcade classics that started it all—alongside a curated selection of most-loved home versions for the Super NES and Sega Genesis. Dive deeper with rare and fan-favorite releases across the Game Boy, Game Gear, Sega 32X, Game Boy Advance, and more—a celebration of the franchise's groundbreaking legacy.
